QuestData.Title: Wildmane Totem
QuestData.Description: There is but one water well left to cleanse, named after the Wildmane clan. For this well to be pure, the land must offer the teeth of a fierce predator, the prairie wolf alpha. Find the alphas to the north, then return to me when your hunt is finished.$B$BAlphas often wander around the base of our mighty city, Thunder Bluff.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Prairie Alpha Teeth from Prairie Wolf Alphas.
QuestData.CompletionText: $N. Do you have the teeth I asked for?
QuestData.RewardText: Very good, $n. I can feel the sacrifice of the land in this offering, and my spirit swells with sadness, and pride.
